exceptions.tactic: rewrite (Derive_ext_loc (fun x0 : R => - f x0) (fun x0 : R => - f x0) x).
exceptions.exn: The LHS of (Derive_ext_loc (fun x0 : R => - f x0) (fun x0 : R => - f x0) x) (Derive (fun x0 : R => - f x0) x) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment f : R -> R x : R Unable to unify "Derive ?M2363 ?M2364 = ?M2365" with "match Lim (fun h : R => (- f (x + h) - - f x) / h) 0 with | Finite x => x | _ => 0 end = - match Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) 0 with | Finite x => x | _ => 0 end".

original: intros f x. unfold Derive. unfold real. rewrite (Derive_ext_loc (fun x0 : R => - f x0) (fun x0 : R => - f x0) x). - apply is_derive_unique. unfold is_derive. unfold filterdiff. intros h. apply (Lim_eq (fun h0 : R => (- f (x + h0) - - f x) / h0)). intros eps. unfold infinitely_near. exists 1. intros. apply H. - intros. rewrite Rabs_Ropp. reflexivity.
